website_summaries.verdict: A little pricier than some other sets; it's aimed at pre-teens with a bit of experience playing golf.
pros: Set includes two woods, two irons, a putter, and a bag
Small bag works great for a youngster carrying his or her clubs
Graphite shafts should last a long time
Orange and black colors will appeal to a lot of kids
cons: Price is a bit high for a beginner set of clubs

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for kids to try out golf
customer_reviews.text: Nice junior set for kids. I bought this to gauge interest for golf by my son and daughter, both enjoy playing with this set, they love to bring it to the pitch and put and the range. Neither can hit the ball well, or very far but they do get some shots off well with this set. Part of it is, the set functions fine, and looks very good, and sometime looking the part helps the kids want to continue playing.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Steve

customer_reviews.title: great for beginning kids.
customer_reviews.text: excellent value. Quality was fine. These are not for the avid golfer kid trying to play jr golf and get super good. They're for a beginner who wants to see if they like the game. For the price, you can't beat it or complain. If you expect $500 quality, then pay $500 for TM or Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii T

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! My son takes a minimum of an hour telling people about all that the bag has to offer (he loves golf) It is uneven when worn as a backpack because the heads of the clubs are heavier than the back end. (But if they would have evened it out it would be too heavy to carry...) It is okay for my 50 lb 6 year old to carry but he certainly struggles
customer_reviews.author: Brittannah

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of junior clubs for starter
customer_reviews.text: Big gift from Santa for Christmas before last, son still talks about it. He's going to be ten in a few weeks, 50" tall, these clubs still fit great and a lot of use to be had. He's an occasional golfer at this time, likes pitch and putt and the driving range. Orange as in picture; my son's favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great kid's golf club set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of junior golf clubs and a good bag with foldout stand. This was a great value for the price and I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: coloradddo

customer_reviews.title: Great set for young golfer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my grandson, he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1st golf set for my 10 year old son. The golf clubs are made with good quality graphite shafts and the irons are soft hitting cavity backed. The bag is surprisingly very well made. My son loves the clubs and it includes all the basic clubs he would need to start playing. I don't think you can beat this product for the price and quality. It's a great starter set and the perfect price since my son will soon out grow these clubs in about 3 years. Then if he still loves the game we will make more of an investment in clubs.
customer_reviews.author: SDfamily

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but annoying adjustments on strap.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price, but the straps are hard to figure out. It comes iwth what you need and it the clubs work well. I just get frustrated when it's not totally obvious how to adjust things like straps and I'm a pretty intelligent person. I finally just gave up and told my son to use the handle. I will try again another day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: The driver head came right off the driver on my ...
customer_reviews.text: The driver head came right off the driver on my son's 5th or 6th time using these clubs. My son's golf instructor told us that the driver head is too heavy for the club (a manufacturing defect). I don't know if this is true of all clubs but needless to say we are returning these clubs. I should note that my 5 year old son has the smaller set for his age group - we have had them for 2 months and so far they have held up.
customer_reviews.author: DTG

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old likes these clubs
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old really likes these clubs. He has been taking group golf lessons all summer. Every Friday they do little games, longest drive, closest to the hole, and so on. He always wins. Yes I'm bragging, my kid is awesome. The rain cover on the bag is the only reason this is not a 5 star rating. It is thin and these are kids clubs so it had a hole in in about 2 weeks. The head covers are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrelneb

customer_reviews.title: Double check the left/right.
customer_reviews.text: I distinctly remember ordering the right-handed clubs. The selection was VERY clear to see, and they were cheaper, which made it even easier to get it correct. I received left-handed. When I checked the order, it showed left-handed. Not sure where the mistake happened, but I'm sure glad I caught it with time to re-order before Christmas. It was hard to see where the right or left was marked on the club box. I'm guessing that it got missed while filling the order.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Durable and light-weight
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old got this set for Christmas. He loves that it is light enough for him to carry, himself. The clubs are good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hines

customer_reviews.title: They broke the first day.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked the wood and fairway wood within a day. The irons seem ok but the flat part of the woods are hollow didn't take but an hour at the driving range to crack them. Wasn't impressed but no one makes anything of quality anymore so you get what you pay for i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Clubs are great for my daughter who is a lefty and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Clubs are great for my daughter who is a lefty and very tell for her age (4'8" and 9 years old). However, the bag is garbage. The zippers corroded to such an extent that one snapped off in my hand. All zippers are completely unusable. The bag and clubs were stored in my garage which is finished, and no one else's golf bag had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter set for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much with this set but it is much better that I would have guessed for the money. The clubs are well made with very flexible shafts to get some whip at the slow swing speeds of a child. the bag is great with plenty of pockets and a kick out stand. When my younger son is ready I will definitely get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: The product itself was very good and my son loves the way they look
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was very good and my son loves the way they look. So he is very happy. These clubs were very affordable. Only issue I had was with the delivery of the product. Apparently, after not showing up for 10 days I was supposed to know that the product was lost in transit. Amazon did not notify me of this until I called them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Happy New Owner
customer_reviews.text: It has been a challenge finding clubs for my left-handed daughter. No used clubs nearby on Craigslist. Always out of stock at MC Sports, Walmart, etc. Too expensive at Dick's. Other sets online were too pink, too this, too that for my daughter. She likes the color of this set, I liked the price. Quick delivery, seem to be sized correctly. We are both looking forward to spring to test these out on the course!
customer_reviews.author: AdamK

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 11 year old's golf camp and many of the kids with more expensive clubs were jealous because his clubs matched the color of his bag. I didn't notice the bag had legs on it until we got it. Nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: myjudge2

customer_reviews.title: Gift recipient seemed very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: Gift recipient seemed very satisfied with it. Enough clubs to keep hold his attention and the bag has good initial construction. Data point: recipient was above average size 8 year old and still seemed like he could grow into the set - handles were still long.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great started set
customer_reviews.text: These are a great started set! The only issue we have had is one of the legs is bent, but it still works. We are looking into upgrading for my son now that he is really into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great quality item. Our 8YO grandson said it was the best birthday gift EVER! I would say it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junior Golf Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my grandson who loves them. This was his first golf set and had a great time on the 3-par course. I would recommend this for the beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Junior golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my seven year old grandson for his birthday.Price was excellant, shipping took less than five days, and the clubs looked very good. I played a round with him and his new clubs and you could see the difference these made in his swingging and distance compared to his old smaller clubs. Definatley worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A good beginning for a beginner!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the Intech Lancer Junior Golf Set purchased for my great grandson. Only time for one visit to the driving range, but at seven years old his ability to hit the balls squarely speaks well of the club design and his distance was impressive. A very good value for the price. My only suggestion would be to add an additional longer iron, i.e., perhaps a 5 iron that would be worth any additional cost. He especially was pleased with the bag and its color. Ed Jones
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about quality
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice but one club is broken. I’m sure it was a defective one considering the other ones seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Online description was accurate and am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Designed
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are weighted for balance and a good swing is more likely with these clubs than a "toy" set. Great value and attractive appearance. My Grandson likes them and he is ready for lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great little starter set. Well built and get the job done. I bought them for my 6 year old. I bought them long so he can grow into them. He chokes up a little and the length works well
customer_reviews.author: Matt Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great starter set for my nephew. It was a high-quality set and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GINNY

customer_reviews.title: Driver head has cracked...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my grandson. The Driver head has a crack the top of the club. how do I do, so that Intech sends me a replacement driver. The driver was hit in 5 sessions, so I believe it is a defective driver. The rest of the clubs are finw.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: He has gone through golf class and multiple rounds for recreation and they are still in great condition.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son LOVES his clubs. He has gone through golf class and multiple rounds for recreation and they are still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf Set for 10 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson. He is thrilled with it and actually enjoys playing golf now. it's good quality for the price, and it was worth every penny. It's just the right size for a 10 year old and will last several years until he out-grows it. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: My son got this set for his birthday. He loves it! It's perfect for him with room to grow. He is a small 9 year old. I only gave 4 star because the zipper in one of the pockets is already ripped after only 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: PickyMomma

customer_reviews.title: My grandson absolutely loved these. I also bought him some plastic whiffle ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loved these. I also bought him some plastic whiffle type balls to use in his backyard and all he wanted to do was hit. It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: My son is 52 inch tall and this set fit him perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 years old son is 52 inches tall and this set fit him perfectly. It's a good starting set for the kid. The clubs, the bag are so pretty and cool looking for the boy. He loves it :-)
customer_reviews.author: CA Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson loved his golf clubs he received as a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: cl isbell

customer_reviews.title: The set is very nice. We purchased for our almost 7 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice. We purchased for our almost 7 year old since he is so tall, the set is still a little big for him. He loves the color of the bag and the clubs feel of nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three Stayingbusy

customer_reviews.title: Good kids set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nephew's 6th birthday. Most of the them fit him pretty well, but the driver is a little big. We bought the bigger set in hopes that he could use it for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Driver dented and cracked in under 10 minutes...
customer_reviews.text: While the golf bag and clubs are attractive, they are definitely not meant to stand up to a child who is just learning to golf. My son tried this set, and another exactly like it, and managed to dent and crack both of the drivers in under 10 minutes of use. The club was never used in a manner other than as intended, it just isn't strong enough for kids. I bought the set based on the great reviews, so am so very disappointed that these didn't hold up. You may want to spent a little more for a better set if you have a child with good upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of starter clubs for my 11 y.o. He's just beginning, but they are better quality than the price would have you expect.
customer_reviews.author: ljwj42801

customer_reviews.title: These golf clubs are great for my 11yr old
customer_reviews.text: These golf clubs are great for my 11yr old. The quality is great. He has had a lot of fun playing golf with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Nyaht

customer_reviews.title: Great set but not for an 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great set but not for an 8 year old. These were too big for my 8 year-old. I will keep them and hope he can use them next year.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product and Happy Grand-Son
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson has wanted "real" golf clubs for 2 years. We felt he was at an age of apprecation and got these for him. He was so excited! Orange is his favorite color so we got a special hug for that. He and his Dad went to practice and we were so impressed, not only with the product but his skill. Dad was impressed too and that alone says a lot. Clubs are well made and the bag is super nice. We will up grade him to the next set as he grows. Buy these and you will have made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & worth the money. It will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Golf Clubs for my Son
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my 11 year old son this year. It's a great set. The clubs are the right weight and the club heads are the right size for him to hit with. I really like having the hybrid wood for him to hit in the fairway, he nails it. He's played several times with them already and does really well. I was surprised how nice the bag is and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old son. They seem well made and nice quality. It has everything that a budding junior golfer needs. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dmalpine

customer_reviews.title: Bag is damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bag is damaged the snap on the cover is broken off
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Downs Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved them!
customer_reviews.text: He loved the color and he is a little above average height for a soon to be 7 year old and they will fit him this summer just fine! Will probably use them for 3-4 summers too! Great investment since there are plenty of places that you can trade in old clubs for credit towards new ones. He'll be a golfer for life!
customer_reviews.author: msuphilly

customer_reviews.title: these are great!
customer_reviews.text: purchased these for our 10 year old who is just getting into golf - they are perfect for him and he LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi D Hartzell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Item delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - Item delivered on time, was as described, great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Walter Koch

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: It is a basic set and is doing the job as my son's first set. He loves that he can wear it like a backpack. Very stylish. Nice performance as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mink

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clubs for my daughter to start out on. Of course I have no idea if she will like golf so I did not want to spend much money. These are nice clubs and a fabulous price!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erbowman

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set! Definitely worth the money! Set is a little big for my 9 year old son but he was able to adjust his swing and still hit the ball well!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Lack

customer_reviews.title: Great set of kids clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of kids clubs. Purchased for my 6 year old and he'll use them through age 8 I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: mdisher

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two oldest daughters. Fits them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, weight, and perfect clubs, great for the price, very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bodge

customer_reviews.title: GREATPRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: these are somewhat good for golfing but still love them
customer_reviews.author: yuhokent

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Now my son can stand in the right place to swing! There nothing like having a lefty golf set.
customer_reviews.author: fresitamx

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect starter set for a young boy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect starter set for a young boy. Was thrilled we could find such nice clubs and that they are left handed. Once again Amazon has come through with just what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomason

customer_reviews.title: He loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a grandson so that he can go golfing with his dad. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: grandson loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good first set of clubs for our grandson....these were perfect. Good quality for the price and he loved them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Clubs
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 7 purchased these himself. The price being so great, I wasn't sure what to think and had concerns...more for my son being disappointed in the clubs not being what expected. When received (a little early) we were very PLEASED with the quality! My husband was very pleased as well as he is the true golfer in the house. One caution I would say: the bag is a bright orange verses a UT Texas burnt orange. My son is fine with it, if you were a fan of UT, I could see that person not being pleased. My son loves using his golf set...
customer_reviews.author: sjn

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our son who is taking lessons. Worked perfect! Great buy for a kids set. Easy to use and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great starter gold set for our 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great starter golf set for our 6 year old son!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: recommend for the hobbyist!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. It's well priced and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Faust

customer_reviews.title: great set!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old grandson was so excited to get his own clubs and these fit him well. He played at SunRiver, Oregon this weekend and played well.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: A SUCCESS
customer_reviews.text: got this item for my older nephew and he really enjoys it. the color and everything was exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chisolm

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a good deal on-line, and after I received them, knew the reviews were consistent. Unfortunately, he hasn't been able to use them yet because it snowed the day after Christmas, but I'm sure he will have fun with them as soon as he can use them. I was impressed with the quality of everything we received (the clubs, the club covers, and the bag). I would definitely recommend this to anyone thinking about purchasing them!
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickgirl

customer_reviews.title: He fell in love with them as soon as he opened the package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. He fell in love with them as soon as he opened the package. This is a good beginners set.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set you will not be sorry at all looks very expensive great beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great it was the perfect christmas gift or our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Liss

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!  Everything they need for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of these clubs. My son is almost10 and about 55' and it's a real good fit. It's our first set so really nothing to compare it with, but I am VERY happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good way to intro the sport
customer_reviews.text: used them for 1 year now, son loves these and i now hooked on the sport. Good way to intro the sport.
customer_reviews.author: Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these clubs in orange for a 7 year old lefty and he loves them. The package even arrived only 2 days after I ordered it! The bag is a bright orange color with stand, backpack-like straps, and plenty of pockets. The clubs are of good quality and very durable. We are extremely pleased with this product and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Quality starter set for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 9 year old. High quality starter set for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: E. E. Mortenson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of junior golf clubs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our grandson's tenth birthday. Nice junior sets are somewhat hard to find. They are the perfect set for him to start lessons with and continue to play with for several years. Good quality clubs and substantial bag.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Golf mom
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son got these for his Birthday and they are perfect. His golf coach said they were a good buy and will last him several years.
customer_reviews.author: Golf mom

customer_reviews.title: Great golf set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons birthday. It is a cute sturdy set!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner set
customer_reviews.text: We bought the older version of this set for our 8 year old who is just getting into golf. We've only had the clubs for a week, but he's played with them and they appear to be a very nice beginner set. We were also surprised that the bag is a nice quality one that looks like it will hold up and the set comes with covers for the drivers. The only minor complaint is that the clubs are a bit heavy but they're right for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: so they are useless
customer_reviews.text: Except the fact that my lefty golfs right handed, so they are useless lol
customer_reviews.author: Casadi D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I brought these clubs for my 9 year old grandson. The driver shaft and iron broke the first time he used them. The golf bag seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B Janda

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: these clubs are perfect for my daughter she loves them and uses them every time we go. it was really nice to be able to find a left handed set for a child
customer_reviews.author: Shaunthepawn

customer_reviews.title: Great set of clubs for my 8-year old boys
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for my 8-year old boys. Affordable price so that I could get them their own sets. A little big for 8-year olds but they will be able to grow into them and continue to use them for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hatch

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these clubs!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs were of surprisingly good quality, and even the golf instructor that my son was working with was impressed with them. I did have them cut down a bit since my son was too tall for the shorter set, but a bit short for this age group. He's really gotten into golf and I absolutely do think that having this nice set of clubs has helped motivate him. Nothing bad at all to say about these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: az_ras

customer_reviews.title: It was a great gift and he will enjoy them for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: These were for our grandson. It was a great gift and he will enjoy them for a while to come.
customer_reviews.author: LeeTX

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: great set of clubs for a beginner. nice bag - everything's good!
customer_reviews.author: deby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Exactly as advertise and shipment was on time. My son loves it a lot and now we both enjoy playing together every Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Sinanon

customer_reviews.title: questionable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old to start golf lessons a few weeks ago. He has used the clubs on the course 3 or 4 times and at lessons twice. I noticed last week after only having them for 4 weeks there is a big dent on the outside of the driver. While the clubs are working very well for him they are not the most durable. Shipped quickly and happy with the overall quality
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to go by---I got a set for 8 and up for a 6 year old, I'm sure they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Casey

customer_reviews.title: great for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: I got these clubs to start my son in golf. for the price point they are a good deal. there are less expensive sets out there but we plan on passing these on to a cousin. So for me the set was the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: dukie47

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Nice set for beginning golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Give for my older grandson son and they work perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sawchuk

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners. Easy to carry. Bag has plenty of pockets. Would recommend this for any kid 8 and up who is looking to get into golf.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality. The head came off one off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. The head came off one off the clubs after using just a few times. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: it is a very nice set - if you are left-handed
customer_reviews.text: This item was advertised as a right-handed golf club set; however, it was left-handed. Hope they correct this before someone else purchases it and then has to return it. On a positive note, it is a very nice set - if you are left-handed!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: intech lancer golf set
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Decently made clubs, nice bag, and seems to be sized right for age range. I would make this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorden

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set for a youth left handed golfer beginning - arrived quickly in great condition. Would recommend to other youth who are beginning to learn golf.

customer_reviews.title: Intech Lancer Jr Golf Club set
customer_reviews.text: The Intech Lancer Jr Golf Club set was a big hit, my grandson loved it.The transaction went perfect, arrived in a timely manner, good price good set, good product. The packaging was very good,protected all contents..

product_meta.title: Intech Lancer Junior Golf Set (Age 8-12, Orange)
product_meta.description: The Intech Lancer 10 piece Junior Combo is designed with the beginner golfer in mind. The combo contains the latest in junior technology with a 17.5 degree 4-point weight system driver including head cover, a 4/5 Hybrid iron including head cover, wide sole 7 and 9 irons for all fairway situations, a state of the art Junior putter with a milled polymer insert for greater feel and a deluxe double strap stand bag featuring a 4-way top. Graphite shafts in all woods and irons and a steel shaft in the putter. Let your Junior get started on the right foot to a game that will last a life time!
feature_bullets: Set makeup - 17. 5-Degree driver, 4/5 Hybrid iron, wide sole 7 and 9 irons, junior putter, 2 headcovers
Deluxe stand bag - featuring a 4-way top with a double carry strap
Flexed appropriate - softer graphite shafts in all Woods and irons
Lengths - fairway driver (37"), Hybrid (34"), 7 iron (33"), 9 iron (32") and putter (29. 5")
